msbt.message: I'm totally in the middle of doing a treasure hunt with .Catch me later, though, 'K?
Hi. I'm in the middle of a treasure hunt with . Maybe we can chat later?
I'm in the middle of a treasure hunt with right now!<10_4 /> When we're done, let's hang out.
Huh?! I totally buried the treasure! For reals! Look You have to keep on searching, 'K? You'll find it!
I hid that treasure in a really good spot. And I'm pretty sure you're never going to find it!
It's def buried out there somewhere! You have to look reeeeally carefully!
